title.label: This app is a must have

content.label:
Rarely do I write reviews. This app has likely saved me money (of me missing a few dollars/cents trying to figure out this math on my own) and so many headaches splitting bills of large groups at restaurants that do not want to take the time to do separate checks. 

Over time, I have actually found it easier to just use this app rather than asking the server to do separate checks. In my experience with Tab, if you’re willing to do the work of figuring out who got what yourself, your servers get the order right, your food comes quicker (since they don’t have to spend a long time at the computer typing everything in carefully), and it makes the experience for the group better as a whole. 

A few feature suggestions:

Appetizers: A conversation that tends to come up when deciding who got what is “well this person are more of this than this person.” Can you create a way to say “this person had 4 of 12 items from this” instead of splitting it 12 ways and tapping it four times? Technically the app does this, but it requires a bit of extra taps. 

Alcohol: Guests may feel it’s appropriate to tip more for elaborate cocktails than they would for a pizza. Servers also tip out the bartender. Is there a way to figure out how to skew tips up based on how much of the bill was alcohol? For example, 15% for the food, 20% for the alcohol.

content.label:
So where the Plates app is too simple and constrained, Tab is far too complex for a simple bill. I have to first scan the receipt (which doesn’t always go well). Then I have to manually type each diner’s name. Then I have to enter each line item with both a price and a name (or correct the OCR from the picture). It’s like a full 5 minutes for a single lunch bill. Oh but wait, the stupid Tax line doesn’t work, so I have to record tax as a “second tip.”

Then I can finally calculate what each person owed. It’s insane how many steps this is for a single meal. At this point, I might as well keep using the Excel spreadsheet I wrote with formulas for splitting tax and tip.

A few notes for devs, hope this could be useful:

- Since my checks are in foreign language I have to translate these using Google Translate and save image of translated receipts. Luckily Tab can use receipt image! Unfortunately it’s OCR capability seems to be limited, it can’t handle these translated receipts well, even text actually look nice and sharp. Probably just need better OCR library. 
- Somewhere closer to final step it tells me that $23 is not distributed. I expect a shortcut here to let me quickly fix this. It’s not here. Also on a step where items are marked it could do better job showing issues like not assigned items. 
- Not all receipts are in USD, people in other countries use other currencies 😏

If you’re trying to apply a specific tax percentage to figure out how much someone owes you for footing the bill, it’s not worth.

You can only change the dollar amount for the tax, not the actual percentage.

For example, on the receipt it says the calculated dollar amount over the subtotal. This app asks you to enter that specifically.

You can’t change the tax percentage to determine what that amount is in app. You would have to do that separately and comeback to in put it. For each person.

At that point you might as well just do the rest of the calculations on your own.

I love the app. It helped me split the check fairly between 11 people. It was easy to use. But I do have a few suggestions. I usually have a meal with a big group(10-20) and everyone wants a separate check. When the restaurant  will not do that I will pay the check and then tell everyone what they owe. Most of the group is technically challenged (seniors) so have no clue how to use an app or do not want to so I get stuck with figuring out the check. It would be helpful if;

1. I could identify the group before I get the check,

2. Be able to see a snapshot of the details for one person  at a time after I identify what they had as part of the totals so I could show them and 

3. Allow cents when entering a tip (sometimes when using a credit card we add a tip amount that would round the total)

4. For me the most important one would be to be able somehow to show all the details of the bill when emailing it or texting it or printing it. It only shows the “All Up” $ and a list of the items assigned to each person but not the detail prices, taxes, tip, etc.  for each person.
Amazing bc I never have to do math again

Why is there no way to split items that ordered by different people??!  

For example. Two people order pancakes. Only one person has to pay for both. Fix this please
I would pay money for this app. Makes eating out with friends so easy.
Really simple way to split the check and not mess with math. The UI is really nice.

Really love how it scans receipts and does what it’s intended to do, which is split receipts! Like that it has the potential to link to Venmo, but unfortunately, it just hasn’t been working so that was a little disappointing. Otherwise excellent tool!

Would be great, but I haven’t been able to cknnect to Venmo for months, but the team has pushed updates since. These updates haven’t fixed the issue. I contacted the team and they said they won’t be updating the Venmo integration any time soon

Makes this app useless… Had high hopes, but just an outdated app 😢
It was about time someone came up with this idea. So easy to use so straight forward. The Venmo connection is still not working. Hopefully it will get fixed soon. Thank you!!!

This app is the best ever and makes splitting the bill a TRUE GOSH DANG BREEZE. Feels like magic how can it be so easy!? Why is everyone not using this app!?! Wish I was exaggerating... but, ya’ll, I just love Tab.
Amazing app. Super simple to use.
does exactly what it needs to while being light and free of charge. i would pay money for it if i needed to cause this app is so great!

Amazing app but can not connect to Venmo. Please fix it

Very impressed.

This app is amazing!! It’s literally everything I ever wanted in a bill splitting app!!!! OCR photo scanning, Venmo integration, splitting with your friends… it’s great!! Seriously, if you ever go out to eat with friends and split the bill, get this app!

Greatest, most functional app for eating out or doing activities with friends. Makes it so insanely easy to know who owes how much; no more having to awkwardly request a restaurant split the bill 10 ways.

The photo scanner makes it super easy, the receipt items & tax are always accurate. Plus, you can save the receipts so can always access them again if needed. Don’t know what I’d do without this

title.label: This app is so simple and effective

content.label: Thank you for your prompt response! I would pay for this app :)

Very convenient when it works but it will stop working and not load a receipt at random times. Full connection to WiFi and everything.

Love this app and think it's the best thing to make splitting checks painless and fair. It even let's you split a single line item across multiple people - which I just figured out. I wish they'd consider a more intuitive UX for this - like clicking on the item for it to pop-up with a list of everyone on the bill and selecting all those that it applied to. That said, it ROCKS and getting the ability to send the results of everything over text without anyone having to download the app gets rid of any concerns about if you split the bill correctly. Great job - would love to see this sold as a feature to a payment company like Venmo!

It was seamless and intuitive from start to finish. The only issues were with the OCR not reading some items, and the tip being captured as “18” from the line “18%” instead of the actual amount. Easy things to fix on my end (and I know OCR isn’t perfect) and easily still 5 stars.

This is a good start because this app is so needed. However I think there are some areas for improvement that are needed before I use it full time. For example, there isn’t (or I haven’t figured out) how to unequally share a multiple quantity item. I.e. if the table bought 6 sodas total, but one friend got 3, you got 2, and another friend got 1, there is no way to split the bill like that. I wish the people were color coded as well, so you could quickly see who was what on the bill.
The text is recognized about 80% of the time but the manual fixes to the bill is easy. Recommend!!
I’ve been using Tab for years and it’s a godsend when going out with groups! Super easy to use and convenient! Really the best bill-splitter out here so far.
I need more apps like this in my life.

Ever since my friends have shown me the Tab app, it’s made large group outings at restaurants so much easier. I have used it multiple times now and until last night, have not had any problems. Unfortunately after scanning my receipt, the app did not pick up on the tax amount listed on the receipt, and instead listed it as $0. I understand that sometimes the text may be hard to recognize on receipts, but please add a manual edit option to the tax/tip screen in case any of the amounts need to be modified.

Other than that, overall amazing and helpful app!
This app is a life saver every time I head out with my friends. Fully featured and super convenient, highly recommended!

Best app ever! makes life easy for your group and for the server. We would use this for our group of 19 and it was amazing! connect through venmo so everyone pays right then!

I love this app. So good. Idk why it has so little reviews it’s so great. You can take a pic or upload one of a receipt, you don’t have to manually input meals. And there are name tags for people who shared meals and there’s even a birthday tag if it’s someone’s birthday and they don’t have to pay. THE BEST - we over complicated everything trying to manually calculate what this app does so easily.

Whenever I use Tab in a group setting, I get a million questions. It’s such a great app, and so handy!
THIS IS THE BEST APP TO EVER EXIST. All my friends have it and use is regularly, could not exist without Tab!
This app is super great! I think one extra thing that would give it 5 stars would be the ability to send the share code via text to the people on the bill.

title.label: What a time to be alive

content.label: This makes me what to go to brunch all the time

title.label: Half your family Mormon? DOWNLOAD THIS APP

content.label: This app had bugs when I first downloaded it, but it’s actually perfect now. It’s great for large families or friend groups that split the bill, but it’s PERFECT for groups that have a mix of drinkers and non-drinkers.
So easy.

title.label: It's nice, but needs some polishing

content.label:
The image processing is the main attraction. The accuracy of extracting itemized items is decent. Could be better, although I realize that's not an easy task. The app may mistakes items with the word 'tips' in it (e.g. S-tips/steak tips) as included tips and so it will not appear in the list of items. Deleting the included tips should automatically add this misinterpreted item to the list, but it doesn't. It has to be entered manually. 
I'd like to see the tax displayed as a percentage as well. Because I know the tax in my area is 7%, I'd quickly know if the list of items is wrong. I also would like to see a pre/post tax option to for tip calculations.
Really wish there was functionality to spilt the cost of items in this app. Like when my friends all share apps. I’m going to delete this app until this functionality is included.
See above

I'm really hoping the developers read this! Just installed it today and used it for grocery shopping, not the most intended thing but it worked out well! Then I ran it through say ordering take out from delivery or uber eats and that's where it falls short just barely. It would be fantastic to have a flat fee option near the end that gets split equally among everyone for things like service fees or delivery fees. This fee shouldn't be taxed or influence it. I think once that gets added the app will be perfect to use In restaurants and for delivery services with friends. Seems like a perfect fit for this cpvid influenced world.
I save so much time with this app. Was skeptical at first, but turns out to be a massive time saver and wayyy better than excel lol
Awesome

I been using the app for years. Works great in the USA. But bow I started traveling to other parts of the world, the app doesn’t recognize other languages and I have to enter bills manually. If at least the app recognizes the amount but it doesn’t.

title.label: Wonderful app, I’d even pay for it if I had to!

content.label: Honestly this app is amazing! After getting shortchanged constantly from cheap “friends” this gets rid of that and everyone pays their fair share! I’d honestly pay for this app because it’s one of which I think would be worth something!
Love the app, but you need to be able to pick how many of one item you had instead of splitting all of them equally

This app is great however I ran into the issue where if you’re splitting and someone got more then one of the same items (for example: your friend got 3 out of the 5 margaritas on the bill and receipt is itemized margarita x5) there’s no way to edit to split where one friend got 3 of those 5 drinks. It instead splits it evenly.

title.label: Great app, but week limit to edit is annoying

content.label: Great UI and easy to use, but why can’t we edit a bill past a week? I use this app for things like grocery/shopping runs to split with my roommate, and having the ability to edit old expenses would be huge.

title.label: Meh, ocr for item names is completely unnecessary

content.label:
The app kind of works, but the OCR is a bit of a try hard feature that makes the app unusable in foreign countries.

I have a suggestion, the algorithms at play here are clearly awesome and can successfully divide the bill into items, how about just giving us the option to view those items as slices of the photo instead of OCR? I'd instantly give this 5 stars if I could have that toggle! 

Also I couldn't figure out how to change the currency, but that's probably just me so...

Re developer response:
Thanks for taking an interest in my suggestion! It’s all here, I already wrote what I think can be improved. Let me turn off OCR and just look at slices of the photo, and make the change currency option (if it exists) findable.
Yay was easy
This app is so easy to use! It directly links with Venmo and is super fast. Makes going out to dinner hassle-free.

title.label: Literally the best app ever made

content.label: Get it.

I love how you’re able to assign each item to people and mark if it was shared. However, why do names need to be shortened? But my actual gripe is how you aren’t able to enter the percent tax instead of just entering the total tax on the bill so that it accurately distributes the percent tax you should pay . If I order $10 worth of food and someone else orders $50 worth of food, is it actually fair to divide the tax in half? Please fix this!!!

title.label: Good start but looking for improvements

content.label: Could benefit from user testing.  Editing bill isn’t intuitive or easy... can’t update name of bill to organize, and Venmo integration doesn’t work.  Would be great to have quick names, either from contacts or previous inputs to make it a little faster.

title.label: Incredible app to split bills at restaurants

content.label: The functionality and user experience in this app is unparalleled. I’ve been looking for a good bill splitting app for a long time and this one is perfect. Snap a quick pic of the bill, it recognizes each line item and lets you assign a recipient to each plate. It then let’s you go even further and not only identify items that were shared - but also items that were shared unevenly. Meaning you can charge different percentages of the shared plate to different people. It takes all the complication out of splitting the bill and allows easy sharing the split bill calculations/breakdowns with friends. I will be using this app constantly. GAME CHANGER!

title.label: Love it a lot, except a few things

content.label: Add ability to store names, so one doesn’t have to type it every time. People typically go out with the same gang. Different colors by name rather than all being orange. Ability to type the bill/ restaurant name at the start, so it saves it by that name, rather than having to edit it.

I recommend this app to my friends whenever I go out to eat! It is super easy to use — you just take a photo of the bill and then the app magically itemizes the bill.

You can then correct anything per line and rename items.

After you do so, you can then add each person, and then select which item they had. It’s also super useful if splitting one dish between multiple people.

The app then calculates all the tip, tax, and then the totals PER person (also itemizes in detail). If your friends have the app and are linked to Venmo, you can request in-app.

It’s a game changer and I use it all the time when eating out. I’m sometimes able to request (and receive) payment from all my friends even before the waiter picks up the check!

Again, highly recommended.

I found that this didn’t work the way I had hoped with splitting grocery receipts. Basically it doesn’t read the receipt properly because so many items have a quantity, price for each unit/lb/etc and then the total price of the item. I’m only interested in the total for splitting purposes. I had really hoped this would help with the tedious task of splitting grocery bills with my boyfriend but so far hasn’t helped to save time
Really easy and quick to use
Going out with penny-pincher friends has never been easier.
I love this app it’s revolutionary and helps so much to split a bill no fuss

Was recommended this app down the beach during a two week trip with varying groups of 6-11 people. Usually venmo-ing post meal is a nightmare trying to do math based on what everyone got. 

Not anymore.

Take a picture of the bill, line up what each person got on the bill, send out venmo requests (or cash requests), done. 

Will be recommending and using this app during my next trip!

title.label: Many years of loving this app

content.label:
This app is so useful. A friend excitedly showed it to me 2 or so years ago and it’s performed great ever since I downloaded it then. It is so handy and not obtrusive at all to use, thanks to the camera. Perfectly designed. 

Only thing I would possibly change is letting the nicknames be longer, which is so minor. Thanks for designing this handy app!
Love this app - makes my life sooooo much easier and they’ve made great improvements since when I very first discovered it. Works really well!

This app aims, and I believe succeeds, in solving the most awkward and difficult part of eating out - splitting the bill. 

Over the past few weeks I have used it with a range of receipts, and on average it does a great job of identifying foods. Even if it misses something, making manual edits is very simple.

I was actually going to recommend that there be a feature for exporting a bill to text so it can be sent to a group chat, but I realized the app already has that so you can tell the developers have thought of everything, lol. 

Edited my originally negative review after using app a bit more.

title.label: So mole to use and works like a charm

This is my favorite app of all time...not kidding

It was a great app the one time I got to use it. Now every time I try to make a new bill, it’ll just have the total from the first bill I ever scanned on the app. So each new receipt I attempt to scan and split up, when I go to tax/tip it says a completely different subtotal.
I love this app
Splitting a tab has never been easier. Download this app.

title.label: Said I owed $400 when it was really more like $75

content.label: Fix your bugs

Everything is well thought out. One of the best apps on the market

First time user! Love the app already, made life so much easier for me and my family when dining together. Only have two suggestions/questions:
1. I tried signing up a couple of times and each email that I got with the link would not take me anywhere once I clicked on it. Just sent me to my google chrome but nothing would happen.
2. I would suggest a feature to put the tip percentage including the tax as a percentage of the tip. My family and friends usually always tip of the total (subtotal plus tax) rather than just the subtotal. 

Thank you and I love the app so far!

I love how easy this app makes splitting group dinners! However, I wish the tip was calculated post-tax - I think it’s standard to tip after tax. I just shorted a waiter because I used Tab’s calculation without realizing :/ please make this an option!

Updated:

Forgot to check the FAQ, so updated my review after a response from the developer. Super useful, and I will continue to share with everyone I dine with. 

Previous review: 

This app is great, one change that needs to happen is if I order multiple of one item, I should be able to add myself multiple times to an item so it properly splits the costs. For example, on a recent tab, I ordered 3 drinks when everyone else ordered 1. We couldn’t properly split the tab in the app because I had a disproportionate amount of drinks compared to everyone else. Otherwise love the app and has great potential.

Also side note, there should be a function in the app to share it with people so they don’t need to look it up in the App Store.
Very helpful when a restaurant doesn’t split bills for their customers!

Great app, but I have noticed that you no longer have the ability to export all the details to a text message. This was great to forward to people who you weren’t necessarily friends with but wanted To give them notice on what they needed to pay.

There are a few weird functionality things that I wish would be fixed or modified (happy to provide feedback if the developers reach out) but all in all this app has saved our friends group so much time and energy splitting the bill. We have a few people that don’t drink, or only eat special or specific food and so when we go out a few people always owe a lot more than others. This app is so easy to use, we use it all the time now.

1. I didn’t understand how the birthday button worked, but now that I do I love it! Allocate everything and then hit the button and say whose bday it is and it splits it amongst everything.

2. We had a weird tax on the bill last night and it took us a while to figure out how to edit it. There were 2 “sub” taxes listed and a total and the app added all 3 in.

3. It’s hard to label the bill. You have to go back in and hit it from a weird screen. 

4. I love that I can text the breakdown of the costs to my friends, but like the layout and info of the breakdown in the app. Might be nice if you could text the image of the breakdown by person, instead of the whole thing, or for it to make a pdf of the breakdown that I could text to everyone! 

All in all the app is great and with weird situations the app usually has a response, it’s just hard to figure it out when that happens. We all love it. Most useful app I own by far!!!!
Tab is a lifesaver and I don’t know how this was not invented earlier. I recommend this app to everyone
Love it. When coworkers go out to lunch and split the tab this works perfectly an no one complains!

Clean design and easy to use. 

1 Flaw is that you should be able to customize the additional tip section. 

I was with a large group and the app did not account for the extra tax on gratuity so I had to add it as an additional food item. This skewed everyone’s final totally due to the unclaimed item on the receipt.
Been needing this my whole life. Group dinner life saver.
Remarkably can scan almost anything.  Just wish I could adjust discount and tip manually at the end.  Sometimes it misreads negative numbers and I often tip round numbers.
One of the best apps I have downloaded. Extremely user friendly and makes splitting tabs so easy. Includes tax and tip so you don't have to think about it!

There’s bug where an unknown unclaimed amount is added to a new bill.

Update: we’ll duh on me! Now knowing some line items captured by OCR shouldn’t be included in the “menu”. Makes sense now. It took a few attempts to finally figure out how to tag line items to people properly.  The only thing left to mention is if you include the tax in your splits, the the next page should be $0 for taxes.  If you remove the tax line item and add the tax in the next page, then your tip amount is before taxes and you’ll have to manually split the taxes.  Confused you yet?  In the end, I’ve figured it out.  Great app for large groups!

Not to be dramatic but this app absolutely changed my life! Group dinners & brunches are no longer stressful and awkward! I tell everyone I know about how incredible this app is. The recent update that lets you see everyone’s totals & breakdowns together at the end is great. Love that you can do on the spot or upload a photo and sort out later. It’s transformative - get this app and make group outings a breeze!! 
Oh: The only weird thing is that names can only have 4 letters (why?!) nothing major just odd.
Great app, very user-friendly and intuitive. This app has saved tons of time and is convenient when everybody’s in a rush. Recommend!

I love this app. It makes it so easy during group dinners. I would love it if it could just connect to venmo without every user having to have the app if at all possible. But other than that it’s easy and so functional.
Literally an amazing app. So helpful.
So fast, so easy to use, and so efficient. If you are ever splitting the check you need this app.

This app is incredible, so easy to use and such a great idea. I literally hated going to big dinners because of the hassle at the end with big checks and tab solves all of those issues. A must have for anyone who eats out. Heard about it by word of mouth and I’m going to tell everyone I know about this app, so simple and solved so many issues. Love love love
My friends and I go out frequently and this app has made splitting the bill so easy. One person pays then we all cash or Venmo them right in app. It’s AWESOME!
This app is amazing. It doesn’t just split it but itemizes each item on your bill, so each person can get an exact total with tip and tax included. A+

title.label: Works great but can’t creat account

Without an account you can’t save your bills/receipts. I did enjoy how easy it was to split a shopping receipt with my roommate.

title.label: Nice app but needs some UI adjustments

content.label: When adding names they show up on the bottom which works if you have an iPhone with a home button. But for newer iPhones with FaceID and no home button apps tend to avoid having actionable buttons in lower area where the white bar the represents home is at. In this app when you have multiple names on bottom and have to swipe left/right it sometimes causes swiping between apps because that area within iOS is design that way. A solution would be to move the names a little higher and make them a little bigger too. This is frustrating and I sometimes end up just not using the app at all when it occurs.
I’m always listed as disconnected on Venmo :(

Love the app but would really love some payment options other than Venmo. I have friends who prefer to use the Cash App and more stubborn family members who only use PayPal. Additional payment options would make this app 5 stars!
The fact that it’s 2019 and people still splitting bills with a calculator or my hand is crazy to me. Hands down the best and most convenient app ever.
Can’t believe it’s taken this long for an app like this to exist. So easy to use and incredibly helpful!

title.label: Great app, wish Venmo integration was better

content.label: Works perfectly but wish you could use Venmo to request the amount straight from your phone. There’s already integration but you can’t request money, only send.
Makes it way easier to split a bill between people, whether they have venmo or just cash. I wish it had support for the cash app, but it works great with venmo

title.label: This is the best app to have when going out with groups of friends

content.label: Seriously, where has this been my whole life. I’ve used this app for the last 8 months or so and it’s been a life saver. So much quicker than trying to manually add up everyone’s bill with tax and tip, and even figuring out how to split shared items! Love the ability to adjust the tip % and also birthday feature that lets you treat someone by splitting it up equally! Everyone I have recommended it to also loves it!!
Everyone should use this. It’s amazing

Having the ability to just scan the bill is amazing and it’s much quicker than doing it the old-fashioned way. Plus you can connect your Venmo which is a great feature. And your waiter will thank you!

title.label: Best Bill Splitting App of All Time

content.label: This is quite possibly the most useful utility on the App Store. Everyone needs this app, yesterday.
Works great!

title.label: This is the best app I have installed on my phone

content.label: This solves every pain point associated with going to dinner with a group of folks. Servers will love you because you don’t have to hand over seven cards with amounts to charge on the back. Your dining companions will love you because nobody has to pull out a pen and calculate what everyone owes (and then end up guessing on tax+tip), AND it solves the “I just had salad and she had two cocktails I don’t want to split this evenly” problem. I cannot speak highly enough off this app: it’s intuitive, beautiful, and unobtrusive. It’s PHENOMENAL.
I split up the bill, then go to the total screen and the subtotal is like 4 times what it is supposed to be.
I’ve told everyone I know to download Tab. Makes it remarkably easy to split bills, takes the headache out of dining out with friends, and the connection with Venmo is so helpful! 100/10!

I really love this app and think everyone should download it! It’s definitely user friendly and really simplifies group meals (which I’ve often avoided in the past because of splitting the bill lol). I do have one qualm tho! I was the one to put down my card and noticed that the total bill amount did not equal the bill amount on the actual receipt. Later when I got home, I realized that Tab based the tip on the subtotal BEFORE tax whereas the restaurant based the tip on the subtotal WITH tax (which is a much higher amount). If there’s a way to change that so the user has the option to change which total is taxed, that would be great! :)

title.label: Great for eating out with friends

content.label: Saved many a headache. I recommend to everyone that I dine with and as soon as they see me use it, they usually download. Intuitive and quick and can be used for large groups, at least 16.

This app solves a problem that has been a pain since humans began exchanging goods and services. Thanks Tab!

Obviously the UI needs some improvement but overall it gets the job done. When you divide a single item into parts it should let you undo that, though. I had to retake the picture instead.

Honestly the most useful app on my phone. I eat out all the time with friends and restaurants are not so friendly splitting bills in Chicago. This along with Venmo makes it super easy to pay with one card and collect cash from others. Will always use Tab as long as it’s available!

Unbelievable how well made the app is. I hate having people always try to split the bill on 5 different cards for different amounts so I just give my card, everyone sends me money and I get all the points. I can't think of a single thing that could be improved. Do yourself a favor and try it you can thank me later.

This makes life so much simpler! I am good at math and so I always end up tracking down how much everyone owes but now it’s just so much easier! The bigger the group the happier you will be to have Tab at hand. Just try to get the bill as soon as possible to avoid having people starting to leave before you’ve gotten settled!

I feel like this app is really good, but there should be some way to skip the tip screen if we are trying to split something that does not need a tip (I.e. groceries). I understand you can change the tip percent to zero but there should be a button that does it quickly.

I’m not sure what to say. So many things went wrong. We got 11 of the same drink - it came out as one so no way to split it. We decided to at least figure out the food and my tip came out to over $1000 which is $800 more than the total bill. Not happy at all. Not sir who’s this successfully worked for others so sad this didn’t work out.
Had this sitting on my phone for ages, realized I had it while out to breakfast with 3 other friends and in a few moments had everything split easily! Highly recommended~
What an incredible idea! Makes eating with friends better and easier. Genius
The concept is awesome. Too bad the app never works. After I take a picture I get an error message that I’m not connected to the internet, even though I am.
Life changing when going out with people and hanging out AMAZING

This app has made going out in New York so much easier. Restaurants don't typically split bills up per person as they do in many other places so this makes it really easy to make sure everyone is paying exactly what they owe. It's more fair than just splitting it evenly between everyone and makes calculating what everyone owes with tax and tip extremely easy.
Wonderful app, clearly keeps everyone honestly accountable for each item consumed by the parties participants.

title.label: Tip added automatically not so useful

content.label:
Four of us on a trip are getting comfortable with the app but are splitting more than restaurant bills

The tipping feature is not welcome in this case. Can we have a “zero” tip button?

Great app but there are some features I’d love to see in the future! 

Splitters each with a unique color for easier organization (maybe opening up the possibility for a dark theme or choosing the color gradient in settings), splitters’ names longer than 5 characters, ability to add additional surcharges (3% health tax), itemized individual receipts that can be shared in-app via text message or other social media, compatibility with iMessage or a URL link to claim items on receipt without downloading the app (à la Jackbox games), ability to edit item list/taxes while pulling up the image of the receipt (in case the receipt has already been thrown away or lost), and saved common splitters. 

I’m also not too into having the camera on in the main menu without selecting New Bill. 

I’ve also encountered a bug where the item name is uneditable. The workaround I’ve found is Select All > Delete and then manually entering the correct item name.
Makes sharing bill costs with friends extremely easy and simple.
Super convenient and works perfectly!
Love the app, but it takes forever to re-add the same people I always have dinner with! Is there a way to have my contact list in the app saved so I can just click?
This app works smoothly and exactly as advertised. Splitting bills is no longer a dreaded activity amongst our big groups.
This app is a life savior !!!
Seriously use it all the time!
Great app I wish I’d had this app the past 20 years! All that math-the division, subtraction, percentages-ugh! This makes going out a much more pleasant experience. Thanks!
It would be pretty neat if Apple Pay/Apple Pay Cash was supported in this app for paying friends.

title.label: Great for groups where everyone is friends

content.label: Best way to fairly share a dinner bill amount at friends.

I would REALLY love to see the ability to put in a custom tip amount rather than putting in a percentage. 

I usually calculate what people owe me after I’ve left dinner. So the tip is already done. And I can’t edit the tip on here to be exact, it can only be the closest percentage point.

EDIT: Thanks for the tip! (No pun intended, lol) Would be awesome if the Tip field were able to be touched to edit manually, then it would totally intuitive. But otherwise, the workaround is definitely doable! Thanks again!!

title.label: I’ve been looking for this for so long

content.label: It’s great and we use it all the time. Saves so much time trying to break up bills. Brilliant idea and execution.

This app is a necessity if you find yourself constantly splitting tabs with a bunch of friends. It’s nice to not have to split the check 5 different ways since one person can pay and the rest can Venmo accordingly. Definitely download this app.

This app is great! It worked perfectly the first time I used it. It is extremely useful, quick, and easy to use.

The second time I used it we had a 20% discount applied to our dinner. This 20% is difficult to account for, if not impossible with the Tab app. I would include an option that includes a way to apply a discount. We ended up splitting the bill evenly.

title.label: Bill summary is incomplete - Otherwise Awesome

content.label:
This is a great app for splitting bills. However, I wish the bill summary (in the My Bills history) showed the total and the tip amount rather than only the individual amounts. An option to show the photograph of the bill would be good too.

Also I wish nicknames could be more than 5 characters long.
So easy to use. Great for group meals.
If you ever split bills with friends, just get this app. It can seriously do everything when it comes to splitting a bill, though some features are a bit hard to find.
How have I lived without this for so long!
Love this app. Makes going out to eat with friends so much more enjoyable. Easy and convenient way to split bills!
love this app. so easy to split bills.
How can I possibly have gone this far in life without this app. This Is the best thing since the portable phone
The solution I didn’t know I needed
GREAT APP. But there needs to be a way to split things when something is ordered unevenly between people

title.label: Great app but could show more transparency

content.label: Love how it does a good job itemizing the bill and it actually got everything correct from the picture. I just wish that on the screen where it shows the final total for each person, they would show each item and price ordered and show the tax and tips on separate lines rather than combining it into pre-tip.
Read bill but gave me new identifiable way to adjust tip. It defaulted to a 50% tip.

title.label: Stop anxiously wondering “How the hell are we going to split this?!”

content.label: So easy to use to split a bill evenly! Everyone plays exactly what they owe. The app makes it so easy to divide up an itemized receipt, and even adds a feature to divide a birthday person’s bill among the whole party. For those who get great points on credit card purchases, you’ll want to be the person to put your card down and have everyone Venmo you 😉

title.label: Extremely helpful app, but only in US!

content.label: Thank you so much for this amazing app! I know it from New York. But we had recently a dinner with 11 people in Arosa, CH, with unbalanced foods and drinks. I showed it to my people, but they could not use it as it was not in their app store. The app worked great also with their receipt, and just printed „USD“ instead of „CHF“. But the numbers from the check were parsed correctly. So how difficult would it be to change the currency sign, adjust the tax, connect with „paymit“ (CH variant of Venmo) and open to the Swiss app store? Thanks so much!

title.label: My favorite app right now, minor change suggested

content.label:
I absolutely love the ease that Tab provides in splitting the bill with friends. Many of my favorite restaurants don’t offer split checks, which used to cause a lot of confusion and frustration when paying the bill, but now I immediately pull up the Tab app. My friends that are unfamiliar with the app are amazed and download it right away.

The only thing I have trouble with is the Venmo sync feature. I have successfully connected my Venmo account, but can’t seem to request payment from my friends using Venmo via the Tab app. I get a message that the phone’s owner must make the request and am not able to proceed. This app easily warrants a 5 star review with this feature corrected!

Love the app - I think it successfully plays its part in making one common thing much simpler. It’s easy to understand and rarely has mistakes. 
One thing that I’d love to see fixed is the use of Venmo within the app. I can’t seem to use it because of error messages every time, stating that it needs to be on iPhone user’s account or something confusing along those lines. If Venmo can be incorporated in a much easier way, this app would be air-tight! 
Love it.
This app is necessary for adulting. Splitting the check was always such a pain when going out, but now thanks to Tab we can all leave faster (and more peacefully).
Ez split a bill
I love this app. Easy to use.

Finally an app that does what I wanted.  Very simple to use.  There is one thing that it does not do though and I hope you can add it as an update.  Sometime I like to share an appetizer with another person in my party.  Can you make it split the price of an item?

title.label: Confusing tag method, cant modify check after is saved

content.label: Simple but close tight to make changes, confusing method to tag members

New: Their response team has been absolutely wonderful and super communicative, we figured it out and I’m super happy with the app again. Went from 3 stars back to 5 stars, super impressed that they reached and wanted to figure this out together. thank you guys soooooo much!!

Old:
The last two times ive used this, the was completely inaccurate, the subtotal was nearly double the bill but the split was somewhat evened up - it was off by $4-5 which doesnt sound like alot but it is when you are the one paying the difference after everyone had already paid and its happened more than once. Please fix!🙏🙏🙏

Super easy to use. Worth a shot! Connects directly to Venmo so you can pay via Venmo from within Tab. 

Way easier than manually charging individual people in Venmo.
Really useful but the “included tip” part is always off and it’s confusing. It’d be good if that part is editable
Don’t know why more people know about this app! So great for big group meals! Makes it fair for everyone and so easy to use.

title.label: My Favorite App and Here’s Why!

content.label: My friends make fun of me because any chance I get, I pitch Tab to everyone who will listen. I used to have so much anxiety before going out to dinner with friends because I dread the uncertainty of how to split the bill. Now with Tab, I’m the first person to offer to Tab it and perfectly split the bill fairly every time. Thank you so much, developers, for making this great app and seriously improving a pain point I’ve had for so long! If you live in a place that refuses to split your checks, get Tab and seriously never worry about it again.

this makes my life so much easier!! honestly i love this

the only thing i would like is if they wouldn’t do automatic tax 

you can even input your own information for the check! it’s so great
Works like magic
Been using this for years and so happy it’s got an update!!

I’ve tried using this app three times. It has the right idea, but does not execute. What works, taking photos of receipts and accuracy. What doesn’t: when I total the tab, tip, and tax, the total is not correct. I’ve redownloaded the app as well as had a friend try the receipts. Still an incorrect total. Unfortunate.
Great job ! Just used the app for the first time. Smooth, efficient, cool! Jee Wizz what an app !
You need this app, trust me!

This app is amazing for splitting up checks. I love using it when we have to divide a check for a large group. You take a picture and it loads everything from the receipt into an easy to see list. It even make it easy to share items between people.

Just used it for the first time a few days ago and it was so easy to split the bill. All my friends downloaded the app as well after they saw how great it was. Saved us such a headache working things out manually. So fun to highlight everything. Thanks!!

Moving back to Australia soon, hoping it's going to work there too!!
This app is smooth, straightforward, and makes something that used to be a headache a no-brainer. Perfect!
I’ve been using this app for... god knows how many years and it’s by far the best, simplest, bill splitting app out there. ❤️
i would equate the happiness i felt the moment i used Tab to the moment i give birth to my first born child. you seriously cannot go wrong

title.label: AWFUL UPDATE - deletes your data unless you give them your email!

content.label:
For years, Tab has saved bills locally once you’re done with them. I rely on that to do the math while I’m still at the table, then have people send me money later.

The developers have CHANGED the behavior, with no notice. Bills are now DELETED once you leave the app, unless you sign up for a totally unnecessary account with them. The app still has the technical ability to save bills locally of course, and iCloud can sync and backup app data, but they have to find some leverage to get us to give them our email addresses so they can sell them or monetize us somehow.

I’m at least accustomed to that kind of selling-out by app developers at this point. But what I cannot abide is lacking the common decency to TELL your users what you’re doing. I relied on behavior that’s been consistent for years to save ten minutes of unpleasant manual entry work, and you tossed it in the trash with no warning, for no other reason than to strongarm me into signing up for another account I don’t need. Shame on you.
Makes dinners out with friends so much easier. Love this!!
Amazing UI. 10/10 would recommend
Had a chance to test this app yesterday after the fact. My old-fashioned mental calculation was confirmed, to the penny, by the app and much more quickly.

I had this idea tonight while I was with friends. As a designer and product developer, I couldn’t do this better myself. Good work guys!! Grandma everything so well and makes life way easier. 

Only tip for design would be to separate the section where it says the person that already claimed item. This should be a different color or more bold so it’s easier to tell what’s already been claimed on the tab! But other than that, you have a fan! Now I don’t have to stress about splitting the bill anymore. Good work guys!

I have tried using tab for the first time in over a month.  The items purchased are showing up, but sales taxes are not.  Very frustrating.  I don’t see a way to manually add in sales taxes.  Please fix.

This app works beautifully.  I wish I had this 10 years ago.  Completely solves the check splitting problem.  Unlike years ago, many restaurants will provide separate bills.  Even so, it may be better to get one tab and use the app—you have more control.

It’s a great app and makes bill splitting much less of a headache. However, I’m on an iPhone X and I’m unable to scroll through the summary of names when viewing a past bill.

Edited:
Thanks for fixing that bug, Tab developers! I have another feature request. Currently, if I want to add an additional tip on top of an included tip, Tab only allows me to add a percentage tip. I would like the ability to add a numeric tip as well
Amazing
I use Tab every time I go out to eat with friends. I have been using Tab for a few years now and it makes dividing up the food bill almost effortless!

This is SUCH A GREAT APP for groups!  It splits everything PERFECTLY, so no one walks away having paid a cent less or more than they owe, including tax and down to personalized percentages for tips!  You can also split one person’s meal between the rest of the group if it’s a special celebration for that person.  LOVE IT!
No mistakes so far! It’s great

Great app to split check, tips and taxes.
I recommend this app to everyone:)

title.label: Has potential to be a must have app by falls short

content.label: It’s a great app to organize a check. I’m usually the guy in my group that Venmo everyone their portion of the check. This app made it super easy to split it by pressing the items. The part that’s missing is that, there is no way to request a person their portion of the check. They have to all download the app and choose themselves. This is a bit impractical when you have a large group and possible friends that don’t want to download the app or people you don’t know well. It would be so much better if you can send requests via Venmo since it already integrates with it.
I love this app an abnormal amount. It makes splitting dishes way less taboo and completely acceptable because it’s fun!!! Thank you for the work put into this app, my friends and I really love it.
This app is super smart and super easy to use! Makes splitting a complicated bill really convenient. There is also an option for birthdays so everyone else can split one persons check! Love this app!

title.label: Great App, simple to use but ...

content.label:
After splitting the bills, one should be able to verify the items they took on their respective tabs. Like a breakdown of their total and not just the general total. 

Also people should be able to individually decide how much they’re willing to tip on their respective tabs. 

One more thing, sharing bills and breakdowns to other apps for people who don’t have or can’t have Tabs installed.

title.label: Expiring bills is a major flaw!

content.label: Why do bills need to expire after an hour? When charging friends for bills from yesterday (or from a recent trip), it would be nice for them to have more than an hour to access the bills.  Otherwise, the makings of a good app so far.
Quick, intuitive, and efficient! What more could you ask for when you’re trying to wrangle everyone to pay after several mimosas? Thanks, Tab!

I wish there was an option to request payment from someone via Venmo through the app. There is the option to pay someone, but in most cases the person using Tab is the one who paid and now needs to divide everything and request it from everyone else. There should also be a custom tip. I know there’s “included tip” but that’s not really the same.
Solid

I absolutely adore this app! It takes me a few minutes to do the check at dinner and then get back to socializing. Thank you so much! By the way, if you ever need someone to test a future release I’d be happy to be your guinea pig.
Love this! Super convenient!!!
Oh, how I love this app! Works beautifully, integrates with Venmo, intuitive, WONDERFUL!
Great app

This app appears to send a photo of the receipt up to a server, where the OCR work is done. In any case, the result is exceptionally good and accurate processing. 

Then it's very easy to assign amounts to individual people, allocating expenses separately for each person. It allows you to add additional items, correct misinterpreted ones, enter any discounts, as well as specifying the amount of sales tax and the percent of tip. 

If the check is handwritten, or there is any other reason that you need to enter all the amounts yourself, you can skip the photo and OCR, and enter the numbers manually.

It's all very easy, and the user interface is well done. I contacted technical support with a potential problem, and their responsiveness was excellent.
Best invention since the napkin!  So easy to use and always accurate.
Cannot say enough great things about this app!! Use it every time we eat out as a group, makes life so much easier.

This is a great app. One suggestion I have is to be able to edit a person’s name or have the ability to remove them all together. Other than that, this app is exactly what I’ve been needing!  I will use this all the time now. At large dinners it was always a hassle to split bills and people would get charged equally for tip and tax but always felt it was unfair to get charged the same tip and tax rate when they got a cheaper meal - so this app solves that problem for me!

I recently used this app for the first time and was able to split a bill between seven people fairly easily and give them their total. I had a question come up later but could not get back to the details to verify that we had split the bill correctly, adding some audit trail would be really useful in this situation. Additionally, another great feature would be to be able to send out, via text or email, an itemized receipt to each of the bill participants. The people I regularly split large bills with have a wide range of comfort with technology, it would be nice to be able to send them something more detailed than just their totals but show them the items selected and their portion of taxes and tip. Asking them to join the bill from their device is way beyond what they would be willing to do. With these two enhancements, this would be the perfect app for my needs.

I was so excited to use this app, but we also had to break out the pen and part. Great concept but not accurate. The tax was also double the amount of the bill?? Our bill was like $240 and tax came out as $230 and I wasn’t able to edit it. So everyone abandoned the AP and resorted back to traditional methods to sort out the bill... bummer! Was a brilliant concept!
Seriously. This app is amazing. Revolutionary.

I'm glad you guys are making improvements. I've been using for years and it's still the only app I can take a photo and split the bill with. It was buggy and missed some things on the receipts but I'm glad youre working to improve.

Does a nice job of scanning the bill, makes it easy to split both total & tip. I particularly liked how it allows you to split a person’s bill among the rest of the party (e.g., for a birthday outing).

title.label: You lose itemized details after done

content.label:
Once you’re done with a tab, you can’t view the itemized details. It’s just gives you an overview per person (up to 5). If you have more than 5 people you will not see the extra details, and you’re not able to make edits to the tab. 

The rest of the experience is great. Too bad it’s just half way good.
So convenient! Takes out the awkwardness  at the end of every meal.
I like this app, but when the tip is included it did not divide the totals appropriately.

After having used this app quite a lot, I realized that the only complaint I had with it was the lack of conclusion screen that shows all the person/bill-total pairs in the same screen. I reached out to customer support and they replied very quickly and updated me on plans to incorporate this feature in the future. I appreciate how the developers continue to iterate on the design to meet users needs.

This is an amazing app for dealing with the annoyance of group outings and single checks. Honestly I don’t know why restaurants don’t have this system fully integrated already. I have to say that at least on one occasion it incorrectly calculated the the portioned amounts and we ended up giving the server an outrageous tip.
Love this app!
I no longer need to look at my Chinese friends every time the bill comes. Thanks Tab!

First, this developer listens and responds. Second, new features are coming.  
I use this anytime I am out spending with friends. Just take a picture of the receipt and split it up.
Very easy, and the fact that others can join the bill from their devices is awesome. Even has Venmo option.
I’m willing to pay for more features :)
Thanks for developing this!!
Excelent app.
My friends hand me the bill immediately every time we go out because they know I will have fun using this app and it will be accurate. A life saver at the group dinner!!

title.label: Very helpful and I like it a lot

content.label: I love this app because it makes my life easier and I can slide through mealtime negotiation like a slick seal through a water slide.
Very intuitive app. I amaze my dullard friends all the time by making them pay what they actually owe instead of what they think they owe.
Saved our friendships and lunches. Now I don’t have to pay for your steak while I’m have this teensy salad!!
I know that sounds like an exaggeration but I promise you, this app is amazing.

It would be great if you could give a title for your bills with the name of the restaurant and/or occasion.

I also think a more detailed itemized history of old bills would be nice.

Great app overall though!

I have tried SplitWise and Tab. I found Tab to be very easy to use and works fast. I like how sometimes it splits 3 orders of an item into 3 separate items, however sometimes it doesn’t and groups them into 1 item. I am the only one in my parties who has this app so I split the tab for everyone. My Recommendation to developers would be an easier way for me to text send the split results to a group of cell phones.

title.label: Still Needed to Use A Napkin

content.label: I was so excited to be able to use this app, but unfortunately, I still had to bust out the old pen and paper. One problem that I encountered was with the splitting of items. My friend ordered 2 of one item ($5/item) and I ordered 1 of that same item. All three items were included on the same line and combined into 1 price ($15); however there was no way to assign 2 of an item to 1 person, so we had to create another nickname to assign to her to account for it. In addition, I had difficulty with being able to add the tax—-try as I might to click on the tax line to manually enter the number. In the end I just evenly split the amount amongst our party (even though that’s not accurate). One thing that I thought would be really helpful was if there was a tutorial (that wasn’t real time) or FAQ section—-unfortunately, the only way you can try the app out/learn how to use it is when you actually have a bill to use.

Clicking to pay with Venmo results in a blurred screen we can get past.  To fix, go into settings to add Venmo rather than adding it within the receipts views.  

The image recognition is also poor. 

Otherwise a great concept that will be great once the kinks are worked out.
OCR can use a bit more work, and Venmo integration doesn’t work for anyone in our group. When we choose to pay someone by Venmo, the screen goes to Venmo then blurs out.

How do you undo a mistake?  I will be going to lunch with a group that is older and not tech savvy. 
I did a practice run of this app, made a “mistake” (choosing the “wrong” entree) and couldn’t figure out how to correct it. 
Great app. I just want to be sure I know how to work it!

title.label: Simple but missing some VERY basic features

content.label:
Love the simplicity of the app! But I’ve deleted it because it gave me a few recurring headaches. 

Most of the time I use this app when the bill is hard to split, so it takes going back into the bill a few hours later to fix things up if we made a mistake. Unfortunately, the app closes a bill after an hour and you can no longer edit! You can’t even see the detail on items per person, only a useless subtotal. This means redoing EVERYTHING again, out of memory. 

Second thing is that I cannot email people the final details... who consumed what, their share of tips and taxes, etc. You can only send the amounts owed by person, which makes it imposible for other people to audit. And to be honest, not everyone wants to download the app, insert the code, etc. 

Last, its super annoying that after using the camera to upload a receipt into the app, if there are any items that can’t be read clearly, it just skips then without warning. I often have to go back and forth between the receipt and the app trying to figure out what was skipped or what item was mis-priced. Specially hard if I’m working off an image from my photo-stream. Why not do an in-app check against the total? Warn you of any gaps?

I would love to see some of these incorporated into this otherwise great app. Thanks
Great concept, great execution, now just missing the last shard of convenience! A bit annoying to manually charge everyone on venmo while flipping between apps.

This app has changed everything.  Gone are the days of getting stuck tipping way more than you owe because your friends were ordering top shelf cocktails and you were drinking water and at the end you just split tip and tax.  It's so fast, so easy, and takes all the awkwardness out of telling everyone what they owe at the end of a meal.  Being able to split things, to break up items that servers group together.. it's like the app developers have thought of everything.

The ONLY qualm I have with tab is that the bills disappear after a bit.  Would really help the morning after a night out to be able to review receipts from the night before.  Other than that, WOW.  Amazing.

I don't know who gave this app one star, but as a New Yorker, this has cured my soul of any grievances, given me new truths and shown me the light. Thank you, Tab, for enlightening me in a darkness of ridiculous rules. You have changed me and I am forever the most truly grateful. I am so emotional.
The one time I actually needed to use it and it could only recognize 3 items out of the 10.
Very very good app
Works great!

Really need a way to *charge* others via Venmo, not just *pay* others. Use this mostly when I pick up the bill for the table and want to quickly split and charge my friends later - would rather not have to force a group of people to download and set-up an app just to settle the bill.

Found this app after I had this exact same idea last week when splitting a large tab. You almost nailed it, but not quite. Great for many use-cases, but missing some rather pertinent ones.

title.label: Why can't it work without LTE/4G??

content.label:
When it works, it works so well and it makes group dinners easy. 

But why do we need WiFi instead of LTE or 4G. A lot of restaurants don't have free WiFi and it is weird to ask for a restaurant's internet name and password. 

Can someone help to enhance this bc I want to use this app ALL the time!

title.label: Good for large groups, some issues

content.label: Not ideal for non-Venmo customers OR those in non-tax states (Oregon). You can't edit a bill when it pops up with an inaccurate line (or maybe you can and I can't find it?). That being said, for large groups this could be very, very useful.
Occasionally software comes along and gets rid of a common nuisance. This is one of those times 😍
Really useful. Would like a way to delete old or unneeded bills and a way to view the items each person had on the summary screen.
I can't believe I lived so long without Tab in my life. I'm going to make all my friends download it!

title.label: The only tip calculator and splitter you need!

content.label: The only thing missing is the ability to charge others via Venmo.

Started a tab during group outing, went back after a meeting, and the app cannot finish editing the tab. Switching back to google spreadsheets that don't timeout. Hopefully this bug can be fixed in a later version.

Soooooooo convenient and very useful.  Please don't get ride of this app I will die splitting up bills in big groups.  I used to use the Billr app and al of a sudden it disappeared so thanks to that I found this app.  Best ever!!!

Sure, you can calculate the bill in your head or even take a bit of time to open the calc app on your phone.  But honestly, after food and drinks I get too lazy.  This is an easy app to use and ensures that the bill is broken our equitably for all.

I love the idea and the technology is mostly there, but why can't I go back later and make changes? Why just an hour limitation? This makes the app only good if you are at the table. What about if you do the tab splitting later? Also how can I delete old bills? Why did the last bill add a discount of $13.50 at the tax and tip stage? There was no discount anywhere. This "discount" didn't show up the first two times I did the bill. Also, a fully manual option would be nice, with the same ability to split a Birthday meal. 

Thanks for listening!

Anytime someone asks me for a favorite app suggestion, I recommend Tab. When you're eating out with a large group of people or ordering drinks, Tab allows you to easily split the bill. Gone are the days of paying $16 for a side salad because your friends decide to split the bill evenly. No more feeling obligated to stuff your face to get your fair share. With Tab, everyone eats what they want to eat and pays accordingly. It's amazing!
If I can charge my friends via venmo, that will be AMAZING!

This app is is very intuitive to use- can you do the math in your head/with a calculator? Of course, but if you are looking at an app like this chances are you want to just make things easier. I like that you can keep track of the food someone ate and then use the "birthday" feature to split their share amongst everyone else. 
My one real gripe is that once you finish dividing up a tab you can't see the itemized receipt, only the totals for each person. Fix this feature and I will have no complaints.
This app is awesome. We're has this been all my life! Works perfectly.
Never has an app that I have downloaded such a pleasure and brought true satisfaction to use!  Easy to learn, fun to us,e and most importantly… It works!

This app is impressive -- but more importantly super useful. I was surprised to see it picked up every item on the receipt correctly and then assigning them out was easy. Honestly it was faster than using the iPhone calculator. 

A few requests to make this app even better: 1) make it an iMessage app so I can share it with people who don't have the app 2) history of your receipts and breakdowns beyond the summary and 3) sorry maybe it's just me but the live camera background drives me crazy!

Definitely try this app!
Amazingly well done.
We compared with an accountant in our party and the app is on point! On fleek! We don't really understand the included tip line. That's what the one star dock is for
This makes splitting the bill easy to use.
Perfect tool to split the bill very easily
This app is fantastic. Integration with venmo is clutch.

Tab makes it so quick and easy to pay for a meal and get out of the restaurant and with Venmo integration, one person can pay on their card and everyone else can pay them back on the way out. It's dead simple and prevents you from having to spend the last 10-15 minutes of your meal juggling multiple cards, cash, and whatever other forms of payment you may use.
had some really great features and the ability to divide items, add venmo, and cover for others are all great. would love to be able to enter receipt manually if possible

title.label: Great App the Restaurant Industry was missing

content.label: Just what you need when dining with friends. Great app support as well.
Amazing app, the Venmo integration is awesome. So quick and easy to split and pay!

As far as I've been able to tell, the only bill splitting option missing is an uneven split. Three of us had four of the same drink, and Tab only allows us to split that one line item evenly three ways. 

Also, would be nice to have, options other than Venmo for paying one another.
Takes way too long. Should be able to save names you frequently use. Should be able to split the tip and tax by the amount of people, not just amount of your order.
Great way to divvy up the check.

The concept of this app is fantastic! Love how it can read the receipt and allows you to click on the item to see what each person ordered and what they owe. However it can use some improvement. 
1. When sharing a bill for others to make changes to it should also allow that person to view who else is on that bill and what they owe (not only the original creator)
2. And it seems that after a certain amount of time (maybe 30 mins) it doesn't allow for editing. Found this was dumb because I wasn't able to finish editing a bill right away and when I went back in I was only able to view the summary and not make any changes

title.label: Used to be great but now nonfunctional

content.label: I used to love this app a x recommended it to many people. Lately though it simply doesn't work. Tonight I tried to use it to split a bill with many shared items and it somehow just added all the shared things together instead of splitting them, almost doubling the total due. We ended up doing the math the old fashioned way. Would love to leave a 5 star review again if the math would work!

title.label: Looks easy and free of charge

content.label: This app works smoothly and is really handy!

Went to dinner with a group of 13 women. This is a regular event and when the bill comes it is always a huge pain. Amazing how bad some people are at math when it comes to paying their share :). Tab scanned the bill, separated multiple items, figured out tax and tip perfectly! It will even divide an item for like shared appetizers. Moving it to my Fav folder.

title.label: Really great for splitting the bill

content.label: We split bills 1 or 2x a week, and it's never fun. Nobody wants to take the responsibility to do it. Now with Tab. It's easy! Just wish I could alter some numbers when the pic doesn't work perfect.

I was at dinner with a large group who were willing to give this app a try. I went to the app to take a pic and have it recognize. I have a brand new phone with a nice camera and the check was clean flat and clear. No matter how many times I tried to take a pic of it I always got no items found. Very disappointing. Could be a problem on the server side but this should "just work"!

I think I was only able to skip taking a picture of a paper receipt after I went back looked for another option with out a picture.. Tried again... Went back again... Almost closed the app... Was going to take a picture of nothing, then saw a skip button and still manual entry and assigning users was confusing and limited. 👎🏻
How does it know sales tax?

It's near-perfect already for such a young app! Has replaced all my spreadsheets for when I pay the bill amongst a big group and then need to split it. Finally solves the problem of the people who guess how much they should add for tax and tip and you end up getting shorted. Excellent app!

title.label: No more awkwardness on split bills

content.label: This app is amazing! For a long time I was thinking why no one has created something like this?! It's so tedious when you're with a group and when that dreadful bill comes after such a pleasant evening--all of the sudden the nice and pleasant evening turns into a small math classroom on how to tackle the bill. Are we splitting it evenly? Paying just for ourselves? Or, Jon  and Sharon arrived later and didn't have the food we initially ordered, so they shouldn't pay for that! Or it's someone's birthday and the birthday gal/guy shouldn't have to pay! Well, wait no more fellow Tab app user because they have just solved your problems. The camera integration is sweet because it basically scans your check and is 90% accurate, however you can manually enter your bill. You can add all the guest and at the end shows what that person pays! Oh, share the bill code and all your friends can access the bill and see who pays what right down to the penny! They even integrated Venmo, can't get any easier!

title.label: Need to choose picture from photo album

content.label: Not camera only
Definitely helped with splitting our bill last night. Will most certainly continue to use in the future! Camera captured the bill perfectly and split the bill without error.

I've had this app for several years, and used to really like it. But the past three or four times I've tried to use it, it doesn't work at all. It incorrectly reads the bill, doesn't split things correctly, and there doesn't seem to be a way for me to fix it. Tonight I tried to use it, and eventually had to give up, after taking a picture of the bill 4 times. It missed several items, and combined others. It had one item that it's split into three separate items. It seems there are some bugs that need to be worked out.

Love this app! Perfect for splitting a bill with a large group of friends. However please add a function that allows multiple access to the bill without losing who owed what. Not everyone pays at the restaurant and would be helpful to be able to access the bill multiple times.

title.label: Needs to allow review of old bills

content.label: Tab needs to allow access of old bills for review beyond the one hour limit currently imposed. I used the app and later found discrepancies in the paid totals but could not review old bills to find whose share was off.

Had this ap for almost a year and only tonight got it to work. Took 3 tries to accurately capture the bill. Couldn't find a way to correct incorrect information or to revise information.
Had to reenter names each time.
Linking names to line items was clunky and easy to screw up.
I really like the idea but it needs usability improvements.

title.label: Really great app, needs minor fixes

content.label: Love this app. Makes group outings easier. However, for example - when 5 drinks are ordered and 1 person ordered 4 and another ordered only 1, there is no way to edit the portions to reflect the actual order. Also - where is the tax modification? Please fix! Thank you! (:

Maybe ok for a 1-time meal where everyone pays precise cash amounts. Cannot persist IOU amounts across multiple meals. Doesn't not remember diner names across meals. Does not deal with one or more person paying (eg with CC) and then people owe that person money. Cannot name meals/receipts.

Edit: just need to add that the new Venmo splitting feature is one of the coolest app integration I have ever used. Amazing how seamless it is!!

So happy to see these guys continually updating and adding new features to this app. I can't tell you how many headaches this app has saved me from and how appreciative I am that it exists. I'm surprised this app isn't on a list of "must haves" - it's one of the best on the App Store and has changed my life for the better.
The best thing to happen since Venmo for going out to eat in groups! Love how easy it is to split dishes and include tax and tip. Of course, Venmo integration rocks.
Such a money saver and fair way to split a bill!
This app has several issues that make it unusable.
Love this app!! Great ux great functionality it's awesome.
This app is a must have if going out to dinner with friends. So easy to use!
This is the app i always wanted to write but couldn't figure out the ocr. Love it. Could add a rounding for people paying cash. Bit tricky so the waitress/waiter doesn't get screwed but would be nice
When is this program going to be updated to fit the new larger iPhone screens? Also for do you delete a receipt?

title.label: Awesome app, liked previous version better

content.label: Hey guys this is awesome works so good and helps make bill splitting easy... I used to put people's last 4 of there credit card and use the see all screen and just hand my phone to the waiter to tell him how much to charge, please bring back the see all peoples totals back, please! Other than that awesome app! Brilliant idea! And it works Great

title.label: Best app on the App Store

content.label: Literally life changing. I don't dread paying the bill with a large group. Thank you!!!
The inability to view past bill details is a dealbreaker. After painstakingly completing an eight person bill, we were unable to go back to check amounts the next day. What use is this app?

I love this app! I really do. I just wish that there was a way if the camera on my phone doesn't read a number correctly then I can just quickly edit that total so it doesn't mess up the entire bill. If I can't make any edits to either a certain item or tax amt. or tip then I can't use the app at all and then we have to end up using the calculator on our phone to calculate the bill anyways which defeats the purpose of the entire app. Hope an update comes soon!
Works very well (when it works properly). Sometimes you have to take multiple pictures in order to get all the items to show up. Super creative idea!

This app is great.  Does a good job uploading the bill and makes it easy to divide.  Also love the part where everyone can access the bill on their own.  BUT, I am frustrated with not being able to access the bill again once I get out of it.  When I try to enter the code, it says there are no active bills.  Please fix this.  If this problem is fixed, I will change my rating to 5 stars.
Please, add a list of currencies to use app worldwide and tips with a fixed paid amount (not percentage) to share between people around table
Great app but there seems to be a bug that doesn't allow to edit the price except backspacing.
Those are my initials, which i have stamped/sewed/written on a majority of the items I own. Hint hint Tab app and Tab soft drinks. Global ambassador over here

title.label: The easiest way to settle a bill

content.label: This is the most convenient way to spilt a bill with friends and family. Simply select what you had, pick a tip and its all broken down perfectly!
Downloaded this when the bill came and splitting our complicated bill was a piece of cake! I'd pay for this app, so definitely grab it while it's free

title.label: Great app but can't access previous bill details

content.label: It's a wonderful app with easy to understand directions and easy tipping amount. The downside is that you can't access previous bill details such as how much a friend would pay if they don't have the app but the bill was completed. If there was the option to see the bill details and pic it would make this app better along with a save picture receipt option!

This app is the BEST! It's easy to update the figures in the app when it doesn't scan correctly. A little swipe and you can update the cost or even divide it! This app is great when you're out with a big group because no one ever brings cash. I've made all my friends download it so they can just join the Tab when we're out. They start checking off what they ordered and we're ready to pay. Great job developers!!
This app is exactly why I've been looking for! I can now split the check evenly among everybody without having to do it on the calculator. Thank you, thank you, thank you!!!!
Great!
